mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_mms_sell_ctgy ( sellCtgyId , sellCtgyName , orderNo , ctgyLvl , parentCtgy , isFreeze , title , keywords , createrId , createrName , createTime , modifierId , modifierName , modifyTime ) VALUES ( #{sellCtgyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellCtgyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctgyLvl,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{parentCtgy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isFreeze,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
